duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive talent planning, development, and engagement to maximize associate productivity and support the portfolio of stores.
Lead ownership and implementation of HR initiatives and act as a subject matter expert in company policies and processes.
Provide objective guidance and oversight on employee relations issues and operational execution.
Act as a proactive, solution-oriented business partner at all levels to develop and drive regional engagement strategy.
Manage vision and purpose, provide strategic ability, and cope with ambiguity in leading and managing change.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's/Associates Degree preferred or High School graduate/Equivalent, HR certification preferred
